item.title: 欧盟有条件批准 Synopsys 350 亿美元的 Ansys 交易
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，已经有条件地批准了芯片设计软件制造商 Synopsys 对软件公司 Ansys 的收购，这是去年 1 月宣布的一项价值 350 亿美元的现金加股票交易。【原文：The European Commission on Friday said it had approved under conditions the takeover by chip design software maker Synopsys of software company Ansys , a $35 billion cash-and-stock deal announced in January last year.】

item.title: 中国今年有充足的财政空间促进经济增长
item.description: 中国财政部副部长廖岷周五表示，中国有充足的财政政策空间和工具来支持今年的经济增长，并将加大支出以刺激投资。【原文：China has ample fiscal policy space and tools to support economic growth this year and it will step up spending to spur investment, Vice Finance Minister Liao Min said on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，KKR 探讨出售英国 Viridor 公司的可能性
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，美国私募股权基金 KKR 正在探索出售 Viridor Ltd 的可能性，包括债务在内，这家英国废物管理公司的估值可能高达 70 亿英镑（85.5 亿美元）。【原文：U.S. private equity fund KKR is exploring a potential sale of Viridor Ltd, which could value the UK waste management firm at as much as 7 billion pounds ($8.55 billion) including debt, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国资深立法者向伦敦政治经济学院和监管机构表达对 Shein 的担忧
item.description: 英国议会委员会主席周四致信英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authortiy）和伦敦证券交易所（London Stock Exchange）负责人，称申银万国在本周举行的委员会听证会上对立法者就其供应链提出的问题缺乏回应。【原文：The chair of a British parliamentary committee wrote on Thursday to the chiefs of the Financial Conduct Authortiy and the London Stock Exchange about Shein's lack of response to lawmakers' questions about its supply chain at a committee hearing this week.】

item.title: 就业报告发布后，美银美林押注美联储可能加息，华尔街顶级经纪商修改预测
item.description: 华尔街顶级券商在周五的美国就业报告公布后修改了对美联储降息的预测，博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）预测央行可能会加息。【原文：Top Wall-Street brokerages revised their Fed rate cut forecasts, after a blow-out U.S. jobs report on Friday, with BofA Global Research forecasting a potential rate hike from the central bank.】

item.title: 麦肯锡前合伙人承认销毁有关阿片类药物推广工作的记录
item.description: 麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co）的一名前合伙人周五承认犯有妨碍司法罪，因为他销毁了与他和该咨询公司向普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）提供的关于如何 "加速 "其阿片类止痛药奥施康定（OxyContin）销售的建议有关的记录。【原文：A former partner at McKinsey & Co pleaded guilty on Friday to obstructing justice by destroying records related to advice he and the consulting firm provided to Purdue Pharma on how to "turbocharge" sales of its opioid painkiller OxyContin.】

item.title: Stellantis 实现将美国库存减少 10 万台的目标
item.description: 斯特兰蒂斯汽车公司北美区负责人周五在底特律车展上表示，该公司已于去年年底实现了将美国库存汽车削减10万辆以上的目标。【原文：Automaker Stellantis achieved its goal of cutting U.S. inventories by over 100,000 vehicles late last year, its North American chief said at the Detroit Auto Show Friday.】

item.title: 曼哈顿顶级联邦检察官威廉姆斯加盟 Paul Weiss 律师事务所
item.description: Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison 律师事务所周五表示，曼哈顿前最高联邦检察官达米安-威廉姆斯（Damian Williams）将重返该事务所，担任纽约合伙人。【原文：Damian Williams, the former top federal prosecutor in Manhattan, will return to law firm Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison as a partner in New York, the firm said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯能源利益集团实施新制裁
item.description: 美国财政部周五宣布对俄罗斯能源行业（包括石油巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom Neft）和苏尔古特石油公司（Surgutneftegaz））实施全面的新制裁，试图阻止莫斯科与乌克兰的战争。【原文：The U.S. Treasury on Friday announced sweeping new sanctions against the Russian energy sector, including oil majors Gazprom Neft and Surgutneftegaz , to try to hinder Moscow in its war with Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国世茂集团收到清算申请
item.description: 中国世茂集团周五称，CPYM Link Investment Limited 已就该房地产开发商提供的 2.58 亿元人民币（3519 万美元）跨境贷款担保向香港高等法院提交了针对该公司的清算申请。【原文：China's Shimao Group said on Friday CPYM Link Investment Limited had filed a liquidation petition against the company in the Hong Kong high court regarding a 258 million yuan ($35.19 million) cross-border loan guarantee provided by the property developer.】

item.title: 特朗普领导银行监管机构的潜在人选预示着规则制定将更加宽松
item.description: 美国银行业监管机构的下一任潜在负责人周五提出了一项全面计划，将在从资本到加密货币等问题上对银行业采取更宽松的政策。【原文：The potential next head of a U.S. banking regulator laid out a sweeping plan on Friday to adopt a lighter touch on the banking industry on matters ranging from capital to cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 英国金边债券大跌引发养老金现金调用，这是 2022 年危机以来的首次重大考验
item.description: 最近借贷成本飙升后，一些英国养老基金被资产管理公司告知要拿出更多现金来支持他们的对冲头寸，但养老金顾问本周告诉路透社，市场的表现是有序的。【原文：Some British pension funds are being told by asset managers to come up with more cash to support their hedging positions after a recent jump in borrowing costs, but pensions advisers told Reuters this week the market was behaving in an orderly way.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，摩根大通要求员工在三月份恢复每周五天的办公时间
item.description: 据路透社周五看到的一份内部备忘录显示，华尔街巨头摩根大通要求实行混合工作制的员工从 3 月份开始每周五天返回办公室。【原文：Wall Street giant JPMorgan Chase asked its employees who are on hybrid work schedules to return to the office five days a week starting in March, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 保险业面临洛杉矶野火可能造成的破纪录损失
item.description: 分析师们正在评估烧毁洛杉矶县山坡、房屋和街道的野火造成的经济影响，初步估计保险损失总额可能高达 200 亿美元。【原文：Analysts are evaluating the financial impact of the wildfires that have charred hillsides, homes, and streets in Los Angeles County, with initial estimates suggesting total insured losses could reach as high as $20 billion.】

item.title: 美国就业数据强劲，美元跳涨，股票期货暴跌
item.description: 周五，美元反弹，而美国股票期货大幅下跌，因为数据显示美国经济在 12 月份创造的就业岗位远超预期，这让投资者更加相信美国利率今年可能不会大幅下降。【原文：The dollar rallied, while U.S. stock futures fell sharply on Friday after data showed the U.S. economy created far more jobs in December than expected, reinforcing the belief among investors that U.S. interest rates may not fall much this year.】

item.title: 激进分子巴林顿敦促制造商 TriMas 考虑出售公司
item.description: 激进投资者巴林顿资本集团（Barington Capital Group）希望 TriMas 对各种方案进行战略审查，包括可能出售整个公司，并在信中称，聘请财务顾问比寻找新首席执行官更重要。【原文：Activist investor Barington Capital Group wants TriMas to launch a strategic review of options, including the possible sale of the entire company, arguing in a letter that hiring a financial adviser is a higher priority than finding a new CEO.】

item.title: 白宫：经济强劲、安全资产需求推动美国在资本流动中占据主导地位
item.description: 白宫周五表示，COVID 事件后美国经济的强劲复苏以及对避险投资的追求帮助提升了美国在全球资金流动中的主导地位，而制造业激励措施则导致了外国直接投资的激增。【原文：The strength of the U.S. economic recovery post-COVID and a quest for safe-haven investments helped boost U.S. dominance of global financial flows, while manufacturing incentives led to a surge in foreign direct investment, the White House said on Friday.】

item.title: 科罗娜啤酒制造商星座品牌下调年度销售预期
item.description: 科罗娜（Corona）和莫德罗（Modelo）的所有者星座品牌公司（Constellation Brands）周五下调了其年度销售预期，原因是持续高企的通胀抑制了消费者在啤酒、葡萄酒和烈酒上的支出。【原文：Corona and Modelo owner Constellation Brands cut its annual sales forecast on Friday as persistently sticky inflation dents consumer spending on beers, wines and spirits.】

item.title: 迪士尼体育直播合资企业 Venu Sports 将终止运营
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼、福克斯和华纳兄弟发现公司周五表示，将终止体育直播合资企业 Venu Sports。【原文：Venu Sports, the live sports joint venture, between Walt Disney , Fox and Warner Bros Discovery will be discontinued, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 印度 Infosys 指责竞争对手 Cognizant 的反竞争行为
item.description: 印度 Infosys 公司周四向德克萨斯州一家联邦法院提起对竞争对手 Cognizant 公司的反诉，指控这家总部位于美国的公司从事反竞争行为并挖走关键高管。【原文：India's Infosys filed a counterclaim against rival Cognizant in a Texas federal court on Thursday, accusing the U.S.-based firm of engaging in anti-competitive practices and poaching key executives.】

item.title: VIEW 令人惊讶的12月就业人数跳升支持美联储暂停更长时间
item.description: 随着劳动力市场在 2024 年年底站稳脚跟，美国 12 月份的就业增长意外加快，失业率从 11 月份的 4.2% 降至 4.1%，这强化了美联储今年降息的谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. job growth unexpectedly accelerated in December while the unemployment rate fell to 4.1% from November's 4.2% as the labor market ended 2024 on a solid footing, reinforcing the Federal Reserve's cautious approach to interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 美联储预计 2025 年仅下调一次政策利率，因就业增长迅猛
item.description: 周五，交易员们押注美联储将至少等到6月份才会降低政策利率，并在政府数据显示12月份雇主增加的就业岗位远超预期后结束降息周期。【原文：Traders on Friday bet the Federal Reserve will wait until at least June to reduce its policy rate, and end its rate-cutting cycle there after government data showed employers added far more jobs than expected in December.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国石油公司称高管将离职转投埃克森美孚
item.description: 加拿大炼油商帝国石油公司（Imperial Oil）周五表示，高级管理人员谢丽-埃弗斯（Sherri Evers）将加入大股东埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil），3 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Canadian oil refiner Imperial Oil said on Friday senior executive Sherri Evers will join major shareholder Exxon Mobil , effective March 1.】

item.title: 美国 12 月就业增长超出预期；失业率降至 4.1
item.description: 美国 12 月份的就业增长出乎意料地加快，失业率降至 4.1%，劳动力市场在年末站稳了脚跟，强化了美联储今年降息的谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. job growth unexpectedly accelerated in December while the unemployment rate fell to 4.1% as the labor market ended the year on a solid footing, reinforcing the Federal Reserve's cautious approach to interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 在线家具零售商 Wayfair 将在退出德国市场时裁员 730 人
item.description: 在线家具零售商 Wayfair 周五表示，将裁员 730 人，退出德国市场，专注于核心业务的投资。【原文：Online furniture retailer Wayfair said on Friday it would lay off 730 employees as it exits the German market to focus on investments in core businesses.】

item.title: 博雅银行消费者投资突破 5000 亿美元，目标 1 万亿美元
item.description: 今年，美国银行零售客户的投资资产已超过 5000 亿美元，该公司希望在五年内突破 1 万亿美元。【原文：Investments from Bank of America's retail consumers have swelled to more than $500 billion in assets this year, and the company aspires to cross $1 trillion in five years.】

item.title: 阿联酋亿万富翁、特朗普的盟友认为，在新总统的领导下，海湾地区将对美国进行更多投资
item.description: 阿联酋亿万富翁侯赛因-萨贾瓦尼（Hussain Sajwani）周五表示，随着美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald J. Trump）的第二个任期预示着 "亲商 "环境的到来，他预计将有更多的投资从石油资源丰富的海湾地区流向美国。【原文：Emirati billionaire Hussain Sajwani said on Friday he expects more investments from the oil-rich Gulf into the U.S. as President-elect Donald J. Trump's second term in office heralds a "pro-business" climate.】

item.title: 沃尔格林博姿扭亏为盈，利润超预期
item.description: 由于首席执行官蒂姆-温特沃斯（Tim Wentworth）努力扭转业务颓势，这家医疗保健公司周五公布的第一季度利润超过了分析师下调的预期，并维持了全年业绩预期。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance beat analysts' lowered expectations for first-quarter profit and maintained its annual forecast on Friday, as the healthcare company benefits from CEO Tim Wentworth's efforts to turn around its business.】

item.title: Constellation Energy 将以 266 亿美元收购 Calpine
item.description: 星座能源公司（Constellation Energy）周五表示，将以现金加股票的方式收购私人控股的地热和天然气能源公司 Calpine Corp，包括债务在内的交易价值为 266 亿美元。【原文：Constellation Energy said on Friday it would buy privately held Calpine Corp, a geothermal and natgas energy company, in a cash-and-stock deal valued at $26.6 billion including debt.】

item.title: 花旗预计全球股市涨势将延续至 2025 年，每股收益将增长 10
item.description: 花旗集团周五表示，预计全球股市的涨势将延续到 2025 年，因为利率下降和通胀放缓可能有助于支撑企业盈利。【原文：Citigroup said on Friday it was expecting a rally in global equities to extend into 2025, as falling interest rates and easing inflation could help prop up corporate earnings.】
